item.title: Air BnB in Honk Kong ‚õ∫Ô∏è
item.description: In this analysis we will have a look at how different variables affect the price of an AirBnB in Honkong First let‚Äôs download the data # download data listings <- read_csv("http://data.insideairbnb.com/china/hk/hong-kong/2020-06-15/data/listings.csv.gz") Some data is not in the appropriate date format so we should transform it From characters to numericals #converting variables to numericals listings <- listings %>% mutate(price = parse_number(price), host_response_time=parse_number(host_response_time), host_response_rate=parse_number(host_response_rate), host_acceptance_rate=parse_number(host_acceptance_rate), weekly_price=parse_number(weekly_price), monthly_price=parse_number(monthly_price), security_deposit=parse_number(security_deposit), cleaning_fee=parse_number(cleaning_fee), extra_people=parse_number(extra_people)) From characters to date

item.title: Covid 19 Analysis ü¶†
item.description: Covid 19 CDC COVID-19 Public Use Data In this project I will look at how covid-19 death rates are affected by variables such as gender, age, cormorbidities and whether the patient has been admitted to the ICU. For this purpose I will create two graphs 1. By age group, sex, and whether the patient had co-morbidities or not 2. By age group, sex, and whether the patient was admited to Intensive Care Unit (ICU) or not.

item.title: Equal Pay Analysis üë©üíºüë®
item.description: Omega Group - Pay Discrimination At the last board meeting of Omega Group Plc., the headquarters of a large multinational company, the issue was raised that women were being discriminated in the company, in the sense that the salaries were not the same for male and female executives. A quick analysis of a sample of 50 employees (of which 24 men and 26 women) revealed that the average salary for men was about 8,700 higher than for women.

item.title: CV

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: About me
